user.title: Unraid Connect Integration
user.description:
Set up Unraid Connect integration. You need the Unraid Connect plugin and an API key.

IMPORTANT: Add your Home Assistant URL (including port) to Unraid Connect's 'API extra origins':
http://YOUR_HA_IP:8123

Don't forget to click APPLY after adding it!
